mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images for faster loading on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Improve image compression and reduce the use of heavy scripts.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance meta tags and use structured data to improve search visibility.
userExperienceTip: Ensure all interactive elements are clearly visible and accessible.
bookingFlowTip: Make the booking process even more intuitive by reducing the number of steps.
tips: Enhance SEO with better use of keywords
